Activity: Log in, check emails. Check the code review from @LPRO-1
Address any comments or suggestions from the code review. Modify the code based on the feedback.
Rerun unit tests to ensure the modifications did not introduce any regressions. If necessary, submit the code for a second review.
Once the code is approved, merge it into the main branch. Document the changes in the release notes.
Prepare a summary of the week's accomplishments and challenges. Share it with @PROD-1 and @LPRO-1. Subject: Week 4 Summary - Server-Side Development
